person.persName: James Smith Riley (Clermont County, Kentucky, farmer, carpenter, and capt 59th OH Inf USA)

body.p: Clermont County, Kentucky, farmer, carpenter, and soldier. Ohio native. Son of Zachariah Riley and Mary Riley. Carpenter in Clermont County in 1860. Farmer in Clermont County in 1863. Served in the 59th Ohio Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain.
